Title: Authorizes Farmingdale First Baptist Church, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes Farmingdale First Baptist Church, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status with respect to the 2023, 2024, and 2025 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing Farmingdale First Baptist Church, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
